title: PHOTONICS
description:
Cat. II
An introduction to the use of optics for transmission and processing of
 information. The emphasis is on understanding principles underlying practical
 photonic devices. Topics include lasers, light emitting diodes, optical fiber 
communications, fiber lasers and fiber amplifiers, planar optical waveguides, light modulators and photodetectors. 
     Recommended background is PH 1110,
 PH 1120, PH 1130 and PH 1140 (or their equivalents).
This course will be offered in 2016-17, and in alternating years thereafter.
